content.title: HIMAYAT- Deen Dayal Upadhyaya-Grameen Kaushalya Yojana
content.details: The HIMAYAT scheme aims to provide skill development training to youth in Jammu and Kashmir to enhance their employability.
benefits: Training courses ranging from 3 to 12 months
content.application_process: Online registration through the official website.

faqs.question: What Would Be The Duration Of The Training Course? Will The Duration Be The Same For All Courses?
faqs.answer: The duration of training courses ranges from 3 months to 12 months (576 hours to 2304 hours).

faqs.question: I Am A 24 Years Old Domicile Of The State Of J&K. Am I Eligible To Apply For Himayat Scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, since all applicants in the age group of 15-35 years are eligible, you are therefore eligible to apply to this scheme.

faqs.question: Will There Be A Post Placement Settlement Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Post Placement Settlement Support will be as follows - Cash amount of Rs. 12000/- (@ Rs. 2000/- per month) for duration of six months payable to every trainee who has completed the 3 months training programme and has been successfully placed in a job.

faqs.question: What Is 'Himayat ID Card'?
faqs.answer: Himayat ID Card refers to the standardized Identity Card that every trainee enrolled under the Himayat Scheme, must be provided by the PIA.

faqs.question: Will Travel And Food Allowance Be Provided To The Trainees?
faqs.answer: Yes, Travel and Food Allowance of ₹50 for every day of the training program attended.

faqs.question: Who Will Be Considered As A 'Dropout' For The Purpose Of This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Anyone who does not have 80 % attendance at the end of the first month would be deemed ‘dropout’.

faqs.question: What Is The Eligibility Criteria For Becoming A PIA?
faqs.answer: Any organization that is a registered legal entity under the relevant laws of India can partner with DDU-GKY as a PIA.

faqs.question: What Is The Expected Outcome Of The Training?
faqs.answer: The expected outcome is to place a minimum of 70% of the trainees in entry-level service/ manufacturing sector jobs.

faqs.question: Where Can I Find The Link To The Registration Form?
faqs.answer: Kindly visit the following link to apply for Himayat Scheme: https://www.himayat.org/CandidateRegistrationNew.aspx

faqs.question: How Do I Contact The HMMU Team?
faqs.answer: The link to the contact details of the HMMU Team are given below: https://www.himayat.org/Contacts.aspx

faqs.question: I Wish To Register A Grivance. How Can I Do That?
faqs.answer: You can register your grievances by visiting the link below: https://www.himayat.org/GrievanceRegistration.aspx

faqs.question: Where Can I Find The Work Schedule For Agro-Allied Sector Under Himayat Scheme?
faqs.answer: The link to the Work Schedule for Agro-Allied Sector under Himayat Scheme is given below: http://himayat.jkedi.org/uploads/training/agriallied.pdf

faqs.question: Where Can I Find The Work Schedule For Manufacturing/Service/Handicrafts Under Himayat Scheme?
faqs.answer: The link to the Work Schedule for Manufacturing/Service/Handicrafts under Himayat Scheme is given below: http://himayat.jkedi.org/uploads/training/services.pdf
